name: Ciro

projects.title: Fake News Detection
projects.description: Agent-based modeling and deep reinforcement learning to counter fake news spread on social media.

projects.title: All to All MPI Optimization
projects.description: Implemented and analyzed multiple All-to-All communication algorithms using OpenMPI, based on optimization strategies presented in scientific literature. The project focused on performance evaluation and parallel communication efficiency.

projects.title: GitProtocol P2P
projects.description: In this project, a basic implementation of the Git protocol was created using a P2P (peer-to-peer) network. Each peer in the network can manage its own projects (a set of files) using a simplified version of the Git protocol. The system allows users to create a new repository in a specific folder, add new files to be tracked, apply changes to the local repository (commit function), push changes to the network, and pull changes from the network. The Git protocol follows a specific behavior to handle conflicts, which are then resolved manually.

projects.title: MPI Parallel Game Of Life
projects.description: Project completed as part of the "Concurrent and Parallel Programming on the Cloud" course.It presents a solution to the Game of Life problem by leveraging parallelism through the OpenMPI library. The program was executed on an AWS cluster, and performance metrics were analyzed.The project received the highest possible grade in the course.

projects.title: Luxury Automotive
projects.description: Project developed in collaboration with Accenture. The software is a mobile application for both iOS and Android, designed to support luxury car sales representatives in their customer care activities. The app was built using the Flutter framework for cross-platform development.
